Package de.lwerner.flink.percentiles.functions.join

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculateLessEqualAndGreaterMapFunction
    Function which maps each double value to a tuple (x, y, z) which says, if the element is less (1, 0, 0), equal (0, 1, 0) or greater (0, 0, 1) than the weighted median.
    CalculateLessEqualAndGreaterReduceFunction
    Function, which reduces the set of (x, y, z) tuples, which represent for a current value if it is less (1, 0, 0), equal (0, 1, 0) or greater (0, 0, 1) than the weighted median, to the sum of each element in the tuple
    CalculateWeightsMapFunction
    Function, which calculates the weights for each partition
    DecideWhatToDoMapFunction
    Function, which gets the number of less, equal and greater elements than the weighted median, and decides, what to do.
    DiscardValuesFlatMapFunction
    Function, which discards all the values from the input data set, which aren't needed anymore
    InputToTupleMapFunction
    Function, which maps each double value, which is input to the function to a Tuple
    MedianAndCountMapPartitionFunction
    Function which calculates the median and value count for each partition, given to it
    TerminationCriterionFilterFunction
    Function for filtering out the decision base, if we have found a solution or we have less or equal elements as the given threshold.
